attributes.action: petition the people of england to find out who we want to run the country when t. blair steps down
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i dont think it should be set in stone that gordon brown should automatically be prime minister it should be put to the country who we want to replace mr blair

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
